page.title: 02HISTORY SOCIETY OF BROMYARD
page.content: The{Bromyard History Society}was formed in 1974. The members are mainly retired. Membership costs Â£3 per person and Â£5 per family per year. There are two present secretaries{Mrs {Weale,}Fox Holes, Bringsty Common and {Mrs Waller,}Keep Hill, Bromyard. The society covers a large area including the old Domesday area around Bromyard of{Little Cowarne}and {Whitbourne. Once a year the members of the society attend a day school. The members have produced books including one on Whitbourne and another on Little Cowarne. These are published locally. The books include a great deal of historical information and illustrations of the area. They also produce monthly journals. A book on hop-growing is in preparation.
